si-addon-preload: A placeholder for when the web query for available sign language videos is running. Can take few seconds.
si-overlay-coreContent-left-title: Title of the section displaying the video (or audio).
si-overlay-coreContent-left-novideo: Placeholder paragraph when no media is available for this word, encouraging user to contribute a video.
si-overlay-coreContent-left-contribute-l: One liner to direct user to Sign Language video recorder on LinguaLibre. Should stay short, will go into a clickable button element.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-title: Title of the section displaying Wiktionary's definitions.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-wikt-iso: Default Wiktionary to use on installation, its language wiki code.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-wikt-sectio: Within the target wiktionary, the html id anchor of the relevant section from which we extract the definition.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-wikt-pointe: A short phrase to point to Wiktionary and it's definition of the written word.
si-popup-browse-title: Title of the search / browse tab.
si-popup-browse-placeholder: Announce the number ($1) of available videos in the selected sign language.
si-popup-history-title: Title of the history / search logs' tab.
si-popup-history-noHistory: Placeholder when the user's search log is clean and empty.
si-popup-settings-signlanguage: Setting title for the sign language selection among available sign languages.
si-popup-settings-signlanguage-help: Hover hint/helper message on the element to change sign language.
si-popup-settings-signlanguage-dropdown: Placeholder if no language available (for developers)
si-popup-settings-uilanguage: Setting title for the interface language selection among available interface languages.
si-popup-settings-uilanguage-help: Hover hint/helper message on the element to change interface language.
si-popup-settings-uilanguage-dropdown: Placeholder if no language available (for developers)
si-popup-settings-history: Setting title to change history's length.
si-popup-settings-history-help: Hover hint/helper message on how to deactivate history logs
si-popup-settings-wpintegration: Setting title to toggle sign language video integration into Wikip|media websites.
si-popup-settings-twospeed: Setting title to toggle video double play, at normal then slow speed.
si-popup-settings-hint-icon: Setting title to toggle shortcut icon on selected text.
si-popup-settings-showvideo: Setting title to toggle the video panel.
si-popup-settings-choosepanels: Setting title to chose which panels are active.
si-popup-settings-choosepanels-definitio: Option button for wiktionary textual definition panel *alone* to be activated
si-popup-settings-choosepanels-both: Option button for both panels to be activated
si-popup-settings-choosepanels-video: Option button for signed videos panel *alone* to be activated
si-popup-settings-enlighten: Setting title to toggle highlight coloring of available words in currently browsed web page.
si-videosGallery-video: Video attibution at bottom of video gallery. * $1 - Ð¡ommons URL * $2 - speaker name * $3 and $4 - position of the video within gallery. '''Example:''' "by MariaNore - Video 1 of 3", with MariaNore being the author of the video. Also, '''do not''' translate {link|$1|$2}.
